content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]This is the web site of ADR Chambers.

Our postal address is:
180 Duncan Mill Road
Toronto, Ontario, Canada M3B 1Z6

We can be reached at contact@adr.ca or by telephone at (416) 307-0000 or 1-800-318-9741 (in Canada).

No representations or warranties

Neither ADR Chambers nor this website makes any representations or warranties, express or implied, in relation to this website or the information or materials provided on this website. ADR Chambers does not warrant that this website will be constantly available, or that the information on this website is complete, true, or accurate.

Nothing on this website constitutes, or is meant to constitute, legal or other advice. If you require legal or other advice, you should consult an appropriate professional. ADR Chambers cannot assist you with finding or selecting an appropriate professional.

Limitations of liability

ADR Chambers will not be liable to you (in contract, tort, or otherwise) in relation to the contents or use of this website, or otherwise in connection with this website for any loss whatsoever (whether direct, indirect, or otherwise).

Exceptions

Nothing in this disclaimer will limit any warranty implied by law that it would be unlawful to limit. Nothing in this disclaimer will limit ADR Chambers’ liability in respect of any fraud on the part of ADR Chambers.

Reasonableness

By using this website, you agree that the limitations of liability set out in this disclaimer are reasonable.

Other parties

You will not bring any claim personally against ADR Chambers’ officers, employees, agents, subsidiaries, successors, assigns and sub-contractors, or against ADR Chambers itself, in respect of any losses you may suffer as a result of the use of this website.

Unenforceable provisions

If any provision of this disclaimer is, or is found to be, unenforceable, that will not affect the enforceability of the other provisions hereof.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
